lines.text: Alright! Enough out of you!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hello?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Joey! Hey, I need to talk to Charlie. Is she there?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No. no... eh... she went shopping with Rachel. Why? What's up?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I'm meeting with professor Sherman about my being the keynote speaker...

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh! How's it going?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: It could be better! He, uhm... he fell asleep!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: What!? But I already bought my ticket to Bermuda!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Barbados.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Fine, I'll rent a car and drive...! Ross, you have to get that job!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What am I supposed to do? He's out cold! In fact he was just talking in his sleep before and evidently he wants someone named Fran to spank him harder.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Well, just wake him up!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I can't! If he realizes that I'm the one that put him to sleep, I won't get the job!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Uh! That's a tough one. Oh! Wait a minute, this happened to me before! Yeah, I was auditioning for a play and the producer fell asleep and...  no wait a minute... it was me who fell asleep... Yeah I mean hey, Shakespeare, how about a chase scene once in a while!?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Hey guys! Dinner's ready!

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: Oh! I'm gonna go wash up first.  Thanks!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: So what do you think? I want that guys genes for my kid! Those eyes, those cheeckbones!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ok, there's enthusiastic and there's just plain gay!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: You don't like him.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I think he is fine! It's just that we don't know anything real about him... we should get more information.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Alright! Just follow my lead!

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: You guys have such a great place here.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh! Thanks, I'm crazy about our place. Hey! speaking of crazy... do you have a history of mental illness in the family?

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: Uhm... no. Although I did have an uncle who voted for Dukakis.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: That's really not the kind of thing we are looking for Zack.

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: Okaaay... so eh... so tell me, how did you guys meet.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh, friends first, drunk in London, you know the story. I've got a better question for you: Do you or any of your blood relatives have diabetes?

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: No...

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Eh... Heart Disease, Alzheimers, gout?

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: You guys don't have people for dinner a lot, huh?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: We're just making conversation.

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: Ok. I heard a joke today. It's pretty funny...

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: You know what's not funny? Male Pattern Baldness

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: Ok listen, you guys have shown a lot of interest in me tonight and I'm flattered and... and quite frankly a little frightened. Can we just talk about something else?

lines.speaker: monica & chandler
lines.text: Sure! Alright...

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: Ravioli's delicious!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I noticed you were enjoying that Ravioli with a beautiful set of teeth. Did you have braces as a child?

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: No I didn't.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yess!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: We're teeth people Zack!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Alright! Let's just do it. Let's just go over there and see if she heard.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Good plan.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ok.  Wha...? where? Where are you going?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh! I'm sorry Rachel, I don't have time for your childish games, ok? I still have to go find something incredible to wear so I can beat Mike at "who's more over who"!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hey, hi! Hey, where've you been?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Oh! trying on clothes.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh! Wi... in the dres... in the dressing room!? Well, that's so weird! Phoebe and I were just trying on clothes in the dressing room. God it's just such a small world!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Rachel... I heard you guys whispering.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh God. You did. You heard. Ok, listen, let me explain.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: No! There's nothing to explain. I heard you. Phoebe likes Joey.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: It's just that... I don't understand it... I mean, Phoebe likes Joey and then she comes here to buy a dress to impress another guy...?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah! That's Phoebe. That's Phoebe. You know, she just wants them all! It's like she's a nympho!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Wow!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah...

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: You know, by the way. I heard you tell her not to do anything. Thanks for sticking up for me. You are such a nice person.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I try...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh my God! You really want me to be the keynote speaker? Thank you!

lines.speaker: prof. sherman
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Wow! You look... ... stop-eating hot! Which is like the highest level of hotness!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Are you sure? Because I'm really dreading going to this party.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Then don't go!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Mike knows I'm coming, and if I don't show up he'll think it's because of him! And I don't want to lose face! That's a very serious thing in my culture.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Alright, then you go to that party and you pretend to be over Mike. And afterward you come to my place and I'll get you good and drunk!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: You got it! Ok. But not on the wine that you made, ok, because I just don't want to go back to the Emergency Room.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: David?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Phoebe! Hi!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh my God!

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Wow, you look unbelievable.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah. What-what are you doing here?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Well, I'm back from Minsk... permanently.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: What happened?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Well, remember how I was trying to achieve the positronic distillation of subatomic particles?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Well, after eight years of research I discovered that it can't be done.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Well, it's great that you're back! How are you?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Good, good, life is good...

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Good!

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Ah well, I-I'm seeing someone.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, good for you.

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: She's also a scientist, so she's very smart and pretty and... well, it's actually because of you, really, that we're together, I mean, I saw what you had with that Mike guy, and I just said "Boy, I want that".

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Mike and I broke up.

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: You're kidding me. Because I'm not seeing anybody, I've just totally made that up.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Really?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know why, I'm sorry, I guess I just didn't want to lose face.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I understand. Yeah. Ok so then ok, so we're both living in New York, not seeing anyone. That's so not like us!

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Yeah, I know. Well... this is probably a stupid question, seeing that you look like that, but do you have some place that you need to be right now?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Well...  no.

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Do you wanna get a drink?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I'd love to.

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Great.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Ok.

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Do you smell beets?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, got it, stay upwind of me.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Hey, there's Phoebe! Is that Mike she's with?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No, that's David.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: There's a third guy?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Tip of the iceberg.

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: I'm gonna take off now. You're gonna let me go home, aren't you?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: You sure you don't wanna stick around a little longer?

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: No, no, I should get home, I'm kinda tired.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Are you just tired now or are you always tired, 'cause that could be a sign of clinical depression.

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: No it's just tiring having to figure out the age at which all my grandparents died. I'll see you tomorrow.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Ok.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I think we've found our sperm!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Does seem pretty perfect.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah, you think so, well? Should I ask him?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Why not, just because his great-grandmother was obese, our kids are gonna get that from you anyway!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No, that's not it. It's just that when we were asking him all those questions before, I just... I just realized I don't care if he's the most perfect guy in the world... he's not you.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah, he's better!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No, he's not. And if I can't get pregnant with you, then I don't want to get pregnant by... him or anyone else.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Really? Are you sure?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sure.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Thank God, because I don't wanna do this either. You know, I was just doing because I thought that was what you wanted to do. You know, I'm the husband, I'm supposed to... bring the sperm.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: That is so sweet. I love you.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: So you know this leaves us with...

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Adoption.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: How do you feel about that?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I think I feel ok about it. Actually I think I feel really good about it.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Me too. I wanna find a baby that needs a home and I wanna raise it with you. And I wanna mess it up in our own specific way.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: So this is it, we're really gonna adopt?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh my God, we're gonna be parents!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: We are gonna be great parents.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: And it could be soon. I mean, think about it: right now, somewhere out there  our baby could be being conceived.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Wait, if we're lucky, and we're really really really quiet, we may be able to hear the sound of a condom breaking!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hey, Zack!

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: Hey Chandler.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Look, I just wanted to apologize for last night. I got the feeling we made you a little uncomfortable.

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: No you didn't.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Really?

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: No you did.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: My wife and I have some boundary issues, you know, sometimes we ask inappropriate questions. We're working on it.

lines.speaker: jeanette
lines.text: Here are the boards for Friday's pitch .

lines.speaker: zack
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: You wouldn't know if Jeanette's planning on keeping her baby, would ya?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey! I'm all packed and ready to go!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh, that's right!  Daddy and uncle Joey are going on a trip today. We're going to a conference in Barbados, right?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Mmh-mmh.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Can you say Barbados?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Barbados!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ok, I gotta say. I mean, it means so much to me that you guys are coming all the way over there to hear me do my speech! UH! And I've a surprise, uh... I had to pull some strings but I was able to get everyone passes to the entire conference! That's right!  This babies will get you into all the paleontology lectures and seminars.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Do you have anything that would... get us out of them?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah Ross, I mean... we're excited to hear the speech but the rest of the time we're gonna wanna do, you know, "island's stuff".

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I think David would probably wanna hear a few lectures.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh, right, because he's a scientist!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: No, no, because, you know, he's been in Minsk for 8 years and if he gets too much direct sunlight, he'll die.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ok, we gotta go, yeah? So, we'll see you guys tomorrow.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: All right, let's do it! 5 hour flight with Charlie, have a couple of drinks, get under that blanket and do what comes naturally.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: It's a blanket Joe, not a cloak of invisibility!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Wow! This place is beautiful!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Look at all these paleontologists!!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I know, there are gonna be some pasty folks by the pool tomorrow!

lines.speaker: woman
lines.text: Oh my God, I can't believe you're here!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I think I've been recognized, this happens all the time!

lines.speaker: woman
lines.text: Doctor Geller, I'm such a huge fan!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: That... never happens...

lines.speaker: woman
lines.text: I've been following your career for years, I-I can't wait for your keynote speech.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Wow! This is very flattering, uh...

lines.speaker: woman
lines.text: I would love your autograph.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Uh, uh... Sure! Uhm... "Dear..."

lines.speaker: woman
lines.text: Sarah.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: "... Sarah. I dig you", Uh? "Doctor Ross Geller".

lines.speaker: sarah
lines.text: Thank you so much!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah, oh and Sarah... I'd like to introduce you to my colleague, uh, Professor Wheeler, a-and this is Joey Tribbiani.

lines.speaker: sarah
lines.text: Are you a paleontologist?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No, God, no! No! No no, I'm an actor. You'd probably recognize me from a little show called "The Days of Our Lives".

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Dude, it's just "Days of Our Lives"... there's no the.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Ok, Ross! It's... It's fun, yeah! No, I-I play Doctor Drake Ramoray.

lines.speaker: sarah
lines.text: I'm sorry, I don't own a TV.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: You don't own a TV? What's all your furniture pointed at??

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: David, can you help me?! I'm trying to explain to Chandler how a plane stays in the air.

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Oh, certainly. That's a combination of Bernoulli's principle and Newton's third law of motion.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: See?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah, that's the same as "it has something to do with wind".

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Alright, I'm gonna go pick up a few things for the trip.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, I should go, too. Oh, now... tomorrow do you guys wanna share a cab to the airport or should Mike and I just meet you there.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Mike?? Who's Mike?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Mike is your ex... uh... boyfriend!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: That's right! Oh, yeah... Well, I've totally forgotten about im! AH! That's-That's... a blast from the past!

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: It's ok. Ho-honest mistake.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Really, it doesn't mean anything. I mean, you know, Monica refers to Chandler as Richard all the time!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: She does?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Let's get you out of here!!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: At least you took me down with you!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I'm sooo sorry!! I just... I keep thinking about Mike! I'm crazy about David, and we're having so much fun together. Why-Why do I miss Mike? That's-that's gonna go away, right?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I guess, in time.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I mean, my feelings for Richard are certainly gone.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: You just did it again. Chandler, your feelings for Chandler are certainly gone!

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Well, Phoebe's still pretty hung up on that Mike, uh?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I wouldn't read too much into it.

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Still you know, a girl calls you by your ex-boyfriend's name, that- that's not a good thing, right?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: David, let me stop you there 'cause I think I see where this is going. I'm not very good at giving advice. So if you want advice, go to Ross, Monica, or... Joey, if the thing you wanna advice about is pizza toppings or burning sensation when you pee.

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Sorry, I just... I wish there was something I could do, you know? Well, you know Phoebe...

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Seriously, we're gonna do this?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: I'm sorry, uh... I just wish I could make her forget about Mike already, you know... Why did Phoebe and Mike break up?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh, because his penis was too big.  Oh, I'm sorry, that's the kind of thing I do.  They broke up because Mike didn't want to get married. Hey, what if you just let Phoebe know you'd be open to marriage?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: That's great! That's great! I-I'll propose to her!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Well, I was probably going to do it at some point.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I didn't mean now...

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Why not? It's brilliant!  Goodbye Mike, we'll see you at the wedding, fella!  well, we probably won't invite you to the wedding...  Thank you, Chandler. Sincerely.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well, you're welcome! Glad I could help.

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: How do you think I should propose?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: David, I'm pretending to read here!!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah! How you doin'? Yeah alright!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey, hey! You said you're gonna wear a thong, where's the thong?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: I didn't mean a thong... I meant thongs...

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: You really should have been more clear about that!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: You're never going to guess who I just saw downstairs!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh! ah! eh... Britney Spears!?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah, she never misses these conferences!  No, I just saw Dr. Kenneth Schwartz!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Oh my God! Did you talk to him?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah... what am I going to say to Kenneth Schwartz?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: You could say: "Hey Kenny, how come you're not Britney Spears?"

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ready to go?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Wha...? You're gonna go now? I thought we could hang out?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Oh I can't... I have seminars all day and I promised Ross I would look at his speech.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: But maybe we can have dinner later? On the balcony? Will be romantic.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Will you wear a thong?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: I will if you will.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh... you got yourself a very weird deal!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I'm good, I have dinner plans .

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: So you'll be ok?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. I've got tons of stuff I could do. I'm gonna hit the beach, go swimming...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Uh, Joe, have you looked outside?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No, why?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh man!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: There's an indoor pool, you can swim there!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I wasn't gonna swim, I was gonna dig a hole!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Wow! That Mike thing was interesting! I don't know what's gonna happen with Phoebe and David.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I do! Want a hint? huh? "I do"  "I do".

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ok, I'm sensing that this is some kind of word play, because you are pink with barely controlled glee.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: David is going to propose to Phoebe.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What?  Why?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Be-cause, we were talking about ways that he could beat Mike and I told him that Phoebe wanted to get married.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Chandler, we have talked about this. You are not supposed to give people advice! Now couldn't you just have made some sort of inappropriate joke?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I did! A penis one! Look, just so I know, what was so wrong about what I said?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: They've only been going out for a few weeks and Phoebe is completely hung up on Mike! She'll say "No", David's heart will be broken, it will be too hard for them to recover from and then Phoebe will end up alone again.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Man, that's some bad advice!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh! Hey! Thank God you guys are here!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hey! Hey what's going on?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Everything is upside down here! It rains all day long, nobody watches tv and Ross is famous!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Alright, I don't wanna alarm anybody, but Monica's hair is twice as big as it was when we landed!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ok! When I go places with high humidity, it gets a little extra body, ok?!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: That's why our honeymoon photos look like me and Diana Ross!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Come on, I'll show you guys where to check in

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh, honey, can you make sure we get a King size bed!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh! David, get one for us too! Oh, oh, and see if they have a heart-shaped one! And with mirrors on the ceiling!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: And make sure our room isn't next to theirs .

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ooh! You guys are so lucky you are here with people, you known it's such a romantic place. That's all, I just wish I could  share that with a guy.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Not Joey.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Not Joey, no, I was just lusting after Chandler.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah, right!

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: So, ehm... I'm proposing to Pheobe tonight.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Tonight?!  Isn't an engagement ring supposed to have a diamond?  Oh, there it is!

lines.speaker: david
lines.text: Yeah, well, being a failed scientist doesn't pay quite as well as you might think. That's uhm... one seventieth of a karat. And the clarity is uhm... is quite poor.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Nice!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Monica, can I talk to you for a sec?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ok!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: David is going to propose to Phoebe tonight!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: See what happens when you give people advice? I hope you told him not to?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: That would be advice!!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ok fine. I'll handle this.  Phoebe?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I need to talk to you.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Are you leaving "The Supremes"?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ok, my husband just gave your boyfriend some very bad advice. Look, David is going to propose to you tonight.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Wow? Really? That's fantastic!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What are you serious? You wanna marry him? Wha... What about Mike?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, ok, you want me to marry Mike? Alright, well, let's just gag him and handcuff him and force him down the aisle. I can just see it: "Mike, do you take Phoebe..."  You know, it's every girl's dream!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Do you really think marrying someone else is the right answer?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Sure! Look, ok, bottom line: I love Mike... David! David. I love David. Don't look at me that way, Roseanne Rosannadanna!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: By using CT scans and computer imaging we can in a very real way, bring the Mesozoic era into the 21st century.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: It's great. You're gonna be the hit of the conference.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh and you know what, it will be even better tomorrow, because I won't be constantly interrupted by Joey checking to see if they put chocolates on my pillow yet. .

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey guys!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: The chocolates aren't here yet.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Damnit!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Ross just read me his speech. It's fantastic!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh, is it on the computer, cuz I'd love to give it a read...?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: If you want to check your email, just ask!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What?  May I?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: What's with the rain, Geller? I mean, when I signed up for Dino Week, nobody said anything about it being monsoon season.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Actually the wet season is June to December.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: It's not the time Charlie.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh, no, no, no dear God, no!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh what, did someone outbid you for the teapot?  Oh! Secret teapot?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Your computer, I don't know wha... everything's gone!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Wha... what do you mean?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: It must be a virus. I think it erased your hard drive.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What, oh my God. What did you do?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Someone I don't know sent me an e-mail and I opened it.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Why, why would you open it?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well, it didn't say "This is a virus"!!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What did it say?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Nude... ... pictures of Anna Kournikova. I'm so sorry.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: What... what am I gonna do? My speech is gone, Chandler!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: It's not gone! I mean, I'm sure you printed out a copy. You have a hard copy, right?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: NO! I don't!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well, you must be pretty mad at yourself right now...!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: It's really gone?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yep! I'd like to thank you guys for coming down here to complain about the rain and ruin my career!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I just feel awful.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah, well you should! I mean, nude pictures of Anna Kournikova? I mean, she's never even won a major tournament!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well, I tried Billy Jean King, but...  you know, you and Monica have the same "I'm gonna kill you" look...? I can usually make it go away by kissing her...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Get out!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: You know, this happens all the time to my computer at work.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Well, what do you do?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well, I usually go... play Tetris on somebody else's computer.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I can't believe this. I can't believe this is happening. I have to give the keynote speech tomorrow! Ok? I have to stand up in front of all these people. What am I gonna say?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I could teach you a speech that I memorized for auditions.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I don't think that your monologue from Star Wars is gonna help me right now, Joe!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Ross, we can solve this. I just heard your speech. We can recreate it! We've got all night!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Wha... what you really think we can do that?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Oh wait, Joey and I are supposed to have dinner .

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey don't worry about that! I mean, Ross needs you! And Rachel and I will stay and help anyway we can.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Alright, ok, let's do it.  Uhm, I know we start by discussing the shortcomings of carbon dating... uhm, and then, then I move on to what is clearly the defining moment of the Mesozoic era, the breakup of Pangea, hello!  And then, there's the... eh... there's the overview of the Triassic.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh, oh! Any chance any of this happened in a "Galaxy far, far away"? .

lines.speaker: mike
lines.text: Hello?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ok, Mike, enough is enough, now you love Phoebe and she loves you, so you need to get over your whole "I never want to get married" thing and step up!

lines.speaker: mike
lines.text: Who is this?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: This is Monica! I'm Phoebe's friend. Listen, Phoebe is back with David and he's going to propose to her, and she is going to say "yes" but I know she really wants to be with you!

lines.speaker: mike
lines.text: He... he's gonna propose?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I... I'm sorry, did you say something? I can't hear through all this damned hair!

lines.speaker: mike
lines.text: Look, if Phoebe wants to marry David, she should, I'm not gonna stand in the way of that and neither should you.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: You don't tell me what to do! I tell you what to do! Just call her. She's at the Paradise Hotel in Barbados. And while I've got you, you've got curly hair. What do you do in humidity?  Damnit!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Well, I hope you're happy!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oooh! I hope you're happy too, honey!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Phoebe is going to say "Yes" to David. See, that's what happens when you meddle in people's lives!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Phoebe is going to say "yes"? That's, that's great!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No it's not, b'cause she's still in love with Mike!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: And there's not chance that will work?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No, I called him. It's not gonna happen.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oooooooh! Meddler! Meddler!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Well, if you hadn't meddled to start with, I wouldn't have had to go in there and meddle myself. Now, no matter how much we meddle, we will never be able to un-meddle the thing that you meddled up - in the first place!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: This vacation sucks!!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I'm so bored! Stupid rain, we... we can't do anything.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well, I've brought some books. We could read.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey, it hasn't come to that yet.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey hey hey! Don't mind if I do!

lines.speaker: waiter
lines.text: I'm sorry sir, these are for the pharmaceutical convention

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey Rach, do you feel like going to a convention?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: We can't. We're not pharmacists!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I know we're not, but  Frank Medeio and...  Eva Trorro... womba...

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Kate Miller?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Kate Miller it is.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: And... that's the most sex I'm gonna have this weekend.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: In that case should I make sure it's on real good?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: And then, and then you said that thing about, about bringing the Mesozoic era in the 21st century.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah, that's it?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh my God, we did it!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Actually I did it Ross. You remembered shockingly little of your own speech.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yes, but I did make a pyramid out of the bath products. This is amazing, thank you, thank you so much.  That's a pretty necklace.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hey, what do you say we celebrate? Champagne?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Oh yeah! Hey, save the cork and then we can fill the bottle with water and put it back so they don't charge you.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh my God, I love you.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Oh, this is such a cute picture of Emma. And is this your son... or just some kid whose picture you bring on vacation?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: That's Ben, my son from my first marriage.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Your first marriage?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: You're married more than once?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: So, why did you break up?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh, it was... it's complicated, you know? She... she was... eh... gay.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Oh my God, this is so cool!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ok, odd thing to get excited about!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: No, it's just... I was enganged to a guy who turned out to be gay!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hey! High-five!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Didn't you feel so stupid that you didn't see the signs? My fiance was always going away on these long weekends with his tennis partner.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: My wife had a workout friend she went to the gym with everyday for a year. She didn't get any fitter.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Right and then everybody finds out and they're like: "Oh, I knew all along"

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I know! It's like, if you knew, why didn't you tell me, you know? I mean, call, or leave a note: "Hi, I just dropped by to say your wife's gay"

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: I know!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: And then, you try to make the best of a bad situation, so you float the idea of a threesome?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: I didn't do that.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Me neither.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Well, who knew? Pharmacists are fun.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I know, that old lady at the end was ready to take you home.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Not enough pills in the world, Rach. What about you, you're the single one, seen anybody in there you like?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well, let's see. There was a really big guy that I was talking to, with the really nice breasts...

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: But what about back home, anything going on there? Anybody you like?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No.

lines.text: Monica, that was also true an hour ago! I mean, please, look at you! Your hand is blistered, you can barely stand, your hair is inexplicable! Ok, you've already proven you are just as good as he is, now we've missed our dinner reservations, so now let's just go upstairs, order room service, take a shower and shave your head!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I can't just walk away! I've put in four hours!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: But...

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Look! You knew this about me when you married me! You agreed to take me in sickness and in health. Well, this is my sickness!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What about the obsessive cleaning?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: That's just good sense!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Aww!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: You ok?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No, no, no. Honey, I'm ok. Shake it off!  Oh, no! No shaking, no shaking! Ooh! Ooh!  Oh my God! I can't play!

lines.speaker: mike
lines.text: So you forfeit?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Mike wins?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I can't believe it!  I lost!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: No, you didn't.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Because I'm gonna play for ya.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: You can't do that!

lines.speaker: mike
lines.text: Oh, that's ok. I don't care which of them I beat.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Ok, we're taking that paddle home, mister.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Honey, you don't have to do this.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yes, I do. Now, I may not understand why you have to win so badly, but if it's important to you then it's important to me, because I love you.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: But... you suck!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: You're welcome, sweetheart.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: All right Mike, let's get this over with. Sudden death. Whoever wins this point, wins.

lines.speaker: mike
lines.text: Ok!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh my God! You're good!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: It's like watching porn!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: And that's... how... it's done!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh my God. That was so amazing! When did you  Hold on! I almost forgot  loser!  When did you stop sucking?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I never sucked, I actually didn't want you to know how good I was!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Why?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: This is so great! Now we can enter into doubles tournaments!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: That's why!

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hi.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Are they still looking for us?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah. The bartender said that they split up into two search parties, the herbivores and the carnivores.  You know, we as a group are not the coolest.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I don't think they saw us.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: I don't think they did.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: Hum, so, I started to say you something earlier, hum...  There was another reason I realized it was time to end it with Joey. I kind of realized I... was starting to have feelings... for someone else.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh. Can I... can I ask who?

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: I think you know.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I think I know too but I've been really wrong about this stuff in the past, so...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I'm sorry... we... we can't.

lines.speaker: charlie
lines.text: All right, all right.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I mean, you just went out with my best friend, and I just think it'd be a really really bad idea.  Or-or not!

lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: homo ergaster
lines.text: Some scientists classify some African erectus specimens as belonging to a separate species, Homo ergaster, which differs from the Asian H. erectus fossils in some details of the skull .
